Message: I am sorry today I can't train I am very tired for the hot temperature so I will stay at home

It's completely understandable to prioritize rest, especially in challenging weather. However, remember, we'll be here supporting you whenever you're ready to take on new challenges again. Stay hydrated and take care of yourself.
I don't want to train, you are only a robot and I don't take order from you

Of course, my purpose isn't to give orders, but to motivate and guide when desired. Your well-being matters most, so please make choices that bring you joy and comfort. I'm here if you change your mind about training in the future. Take good care.
today I don't want to train, because I have to study

I appreciate your focus on studying, an important aspect of personal growth. Remember, self-care involves balancing multiple responsibilities. When you're ready to exercise again, we'll be here to support you. Good luck with your studies!
